returns._0: results array: 0 = not in word, 1 = in word wrong position, 2 = correct position

addWord(string).notice: Owner can add new unique-letter word to the list

hasNewDailyWord().notice: Returns true if a new daily word is available for caller

submitGuess(string).notice: Submit a plaintext guess and get per-position results

updateDailySeed().notice: Update the daily seed and target word (idempotent if same day)

userdoc.notice: Purely on-chain Wordle without FHE; uses daily pseudo-random word from a curated list
